# Cargo Department SOP These are the list of SOPs that Cargo Personnel should follow. These are, as stated before, [bold]not checklists[/bold] and should be treated as guidelines.
The following jobs have entries in this Department, the [color=#1b67a5][bold]Quartermaster[/bold][/color] being the Head of Staff: - [textlink="Quartermaster" link="Quartermaster SOP"] - [textlink="Cargo Technician" link="CargoTech SOP"] - [textlink="Salvage Specialist" link="SalvageSpecialist SOP"]
